text: Neolitsea daibuensis is a species of plant in the family Lauraceae endemic to Taiwan. It is a small semi-deciduous tree that grows in the broad-leaved forests in southern Taiwan at altitudes of . It is threatened by habitat loss. ==References== daibuensis Category:Endangered plants Category:Endemic flora of Taiwan Category:Trees of Taiwan Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Neolitsea daibuensis
